Have you had people complain about the price of your product or service and try to knock it down by saying they can get the same stuff elsewhere for free?

Serious advice to all my friends on LinkedIn.  Do not send those 'congratulations on your new position' notifications to anyone, especially busy people.  It adds no value, it is not a conversation starter, and people who have a lot of connections receive thousands of them a year.  They might just drop the connection with you.
Just avoid them entirely.  It's a poorly thought out feature you should never use.  If you have nothing else to say, don't say anything.
I say this with love.  It does not help you, and definitely can harm you.

ICO Advisory Group provides advice, compliance, funding and success for the new blockchain-based securities known as ICOs.

Causecast is the leading cause integration company, providing a modern employee cause engagement solution for companies of all sizes.  This SaaS platform offers workforce matching donations, volunteering including dollars for doers, disaster response and custom campaigns which leverage social media and automation.

BlockRx is a Technology Solution Provider supporting the BioPharma and Life Sciences Industry with its ADLT™ Blockchain solution.  My role as a member of the Executive Advisory Board is to provide support and strategy to the Executive Management team for aligning Investments, Governance, and Strategic Partnerships.

Karma is a blockchain technology company now sharing with the world its proprietary membership and event management platform, derived from 12 years of refinement, 65,000 platform users, 374 events and $32 million in revenue. recommendations: JOhn Rokos
Advisor at Archethought
April 10, 2017, JOhn worked with Ryan in different groups

I can say that Ryan has been one of the most responsive and generous people I have ever come across. I didn't know Ryan when I first reached out to him, but explained that my dream was to work at Tesla Motors, where he was an investor. He responded quickly, connected me to decision makers, followed up completely, and opened the door for me, and I ended up getting the job. He is an all around honorable guy with great integrity, and it has been a pleasure to connect with him and get to know him better.

summary: Serial entrepreneur and pioneer, humanist and philanthropist.  Investor and advisor to many interesting companies and charities.As founding partner of ICO Advisory Group, I help new blockchain companies tailor their offering and reach a wide audience of investors.As the CEO and Founder of Cauasecast, my goal is to create a world in which corporations compete with each other to make the most positive social impact.  I hope to achieve this through the Causecast Community Impact Platform, a software and service combination that helps corporations engage their most powerful brand ambassadors - their employees - in corporate philanthropy and workplace volunteerism.
